TestGroupDocumentation.Title: JAXBResult tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: Test descriptions and specifications for JAXBResult tests.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that JAXBResult(JAXBContext context) with valid context throws no exceptions.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that getResult() throws IllegalStateException if the method is called before an object is unmarshalled. JAXBResult(JAXBContext) constructor is used.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that JAXBResult((JAXBContext)null) throws JAXBException.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that JAXBResult(Unmarshaller unmarshaller) with valid unmarshaller throws no exceptions.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that JAXBResult((Unmarshaller)null) throws JAXBException.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that getResult() throws IllegalStateException if the method is called before an object is unmarshalled. JAXBResult(Unmarshaller) constructor is used.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: Constructor test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test checks that getResult() returns the unmarshalled object created by the transformation - non-null object. Resulted object is equal to the original.
